modName: Black Mage Hood brown Retexture - DELETED
summary: It\'s not like it was actually black anyways. Requires \"Non-playable Armor\" by gibbed.
descriptionHtml:
A simple retexture of the cool black mage hood found that you can\'t wear normally.

Non-playable Armor by gibbed
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=820

You must install his mod first or your character will not be able to wear it.

Place files in Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

Location:
Found on some enemies

OR with console:
Type

help \"Black Mage Hood\" 4
player.additem 000C5D10 1

Uninstall:
delete 

hood.dds
hood_n.dds

in textures\\clothes\\warlock

*Incompatible with other mods that texture the same hood.

Made it for my personal armor scheme because the purple didn\'t suit my needs.
I just thought I\'d share it with everyone.
Enjoy!


For the armor scheme in the screen shots:

\"Blackened Steel Fullplate and Greatsword\" by PLZAXBB (for armor)
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=851

\"Ebony Wolf Armor Re-texture\" by Heidenreich (for gauntlets and boots)
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2046

\"Grey Orcish Weapons and Armor\" by TheHullu for (sword and great sword on back)
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1252

with Nord Hero Arrows and the black mage hood, of course. :)

To get inventory weapons of your choice to appear on your character, follow my guide here:
http://www.thenexusforums.com/index.php?/topic/466826-display-multiple-inventory-weapons-on-player-character/

Let me know what you guys think. Or not, whatever.
author: EricTheLuminant
